duties_responsibilities.duty: Seat guests promptly, set up host/hostess stand, review guest reservation book, and make recommendations for room setup.
Manage restaurant capacity, communicate with Restaurant and Management Team, and answer guest inquiries via telephone and emails.
Recognize regular guests, maintain daily menus, and ensure quality and condition of menu items and daily specials.
Work harmoniously with co-workers and supervisors, complete special projects, and ensure proper table set-up.
Take guest orders, plate and prepare food items, and perform other tasks as assigned by management.
Assist in areas of Food & Beverage when needed due to heavy volume or in the absence of other staff.

education_certification.credential: High School education or equivalent experience, Food Handlers Permit, Responsible Beverage Service (RBS) Permit
